title: Projects
subtitle: Things I've built
description: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and experience

taskManagement.title: Task Management System
taskManagement.description: Full-stack team collaboration app with project and task management, real-time SignalR notifications, file attachments, and interactive analytics dashboard.

techbooksStore.title: TechBooks Store
techbooksStore.description: Modern bookstore built with React featuring Google Books API search, shopping cart, Google OAuth authentication, and smooth responsive animations.

quizme.title: QuizMe - Islamic Knowledge Challenge
quizme.description: Interactive Arabic quiz app about Quran, Prophets, and Companions with flip cards, four categories, and beautiful RTL animations.

adviceGenerator.title: Advice Generator App
adviceGenerator.description: A clean and responsive  app that delivers random pieces of advice using the Advice Slip API. Features instant advice generation on dice click, hover effects, mobile-first responsive design, and clever cache-busting technique for fresh data on every request.

htmlTemplate03.title: Modern Responsive Landing Page
htmlTemplate03.description: Fully responsive landing page with CSS Grid and Flexbox, featuring animated sections, testimonials, services, and skills showcase.

casperTemplate.title: Casper Creative Template
casperTemplate.description: Pixel-perfect HTML/CSS template with clean modern UI, cross-browser compatibility, and lightweight optimized code.

recipePage.title: Recipe Page
recipePage.description: A clean, elegant, and fully responsive recipe page challenge from Frontend Mentor. Built with semantic HTML5 and modern CSS, featuring beautiful typography, proper spacing, mobile-first responsive layout, custom properties, and subtle hover states.

ageCalculator.title: Age Calculator
ageCalculator.description: An elegant, fully responsive age calculator that computes exact age in years, months, and days. Features comprehensive real-time form validation (empty fields, invalid/inconsistent dates, future dates) built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.

perfumeCard.title: Product Card
perfumeCard.description: A beautifully crafted, responsive product preview card for a luxury perfume. Responsive image switching (mobile/desktop), elegant spacing, hover states on the CTA button using only HTML5 and CSS Flexbox.
